request.description:
WebSocket endpoint: ws://{{HOST}}/ws
Use WebSocket client to connect.

Topics:
- /topic/admin-feeds (Admin activity feeds)
- /topic/notifications/admin (Admin notifications)
- /topic/notifications/teacher (Teacher notifications)
- /topic/notifications/parent (Parent notifications)
- /topic/notifications/student (Student notifications)
- /topic/system-alerts (System alerts)
- /queue/user/{userId}/notifications (Personal notifications)

Test messages:
- /app/test (Echo test)
- /app/admin/broadcast (Admin broadcast)
- /app/broadcast/roles (Role-specific broadcast)

body.description: Send via WebSocket to /app/echo. Response will be on /topic/echo
Send via WebSocket to /app/admin/broadcast. All users will receive this.
Send via WebSocket to /app/broadcast/roles. Only specified roles will receive this.
Send via WebSocket to /app/admin/system-alert. Admins will receive this on /topic/system-alerts.
